author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
If someone is wondering what this is about, it's a piece of [JuDoc.jl](https://github.com/tlienart/JuDoc.jl), a static site generator (and the main project). I wanted to detach this as it's just the template files and it helps to separate the development of those and the core package which looks after parsing and rendering. 

I wanted to register it to avoid problems with un-registered dependency, Documenter.jl and Travis (the somewhat dreaded `ERROR: Unsatisfiable requirements detected for package JuDocTemplates`.).

I tried to create a release but ran into this error:
```
POST https://api.github.com/repos/tlienart/JuDocTemplates.jl/releases: 422 Validation Failed [{Resource:Release Field:tag_name Code:already_exists Message:}]
```
cc: @christopher-dG
@tlienart no need to manually create tags :slightly_smiling_face:
@christopher-dG yes thanks, I had tagged a version before reading about installing TagBot ðŸ˜•
